#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked

void scanint(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
int arr[100001][200],ans[100001]={0},add[201]={0};
int main() {
	int a,b,n,i,j,k,l;
	//cin>>n>>k;
	scanint(n);
	scanint(k);
	for(i=0;i<=100000;i++)
	for(j=0;j<200;j++)
	arr[i][j]=0;
	while(k--)
	{
		
	scanint(a);
	scanint(b);
		if(a>=200)
		{
			for(i=b;i<=n;i+=a)
			{
				ans[i]++;
			}
			
		}
		else
		{
			arr[b][a]++;
			
		}
	}
	
	for(i=1; i<200; i++)
    {
        for( j=0; j<i; j++)
            add[j] = 0;
 
        for( j=1; j<=n; j++)
        {
            add[j%i]+= arr[j][i];
 
            ans[j]+= add[j%i];
        }
    }
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	cout<<ans[i]<<" ";
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
